Name: FileCode
Description: Two-letter site identification code (e.g. He, Sc, Kc).

Name: MultipleMetFiles
Description: Specifies whether one single meteorological forcing file is used for all grids or a separate met file is provided for each grid.

Name: MultipleInitFiles
Description: Specifies whether one single initial conditions file is used for all grids at the start of the run or a separate initial conditions file is provided for each grid.

Name: MultipleESTMFiles
Description: Specifies whether one single ESTM forcing file is used for all grids or a separate file is provided for each grid.

Name: KeepTstepFilesIn
Description: Specifies whether input meteorological forcing files at the resolution of the model time step should be saved.

Name: KeepTstepFilesOut
Description: Specifies whether output meteorological forcing files at the resolution of the model time step should be saved.

Name: WriteOutOption
Description: Specifies which variables are written in the output files.

Name: SuppressWarnings
Description: Controls whether the warnings.txt file is written or not.
